downloadTitle: Project Analyzer in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Project Analyzer module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.​
detailsSection:
Audience This training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the Project Analyzer module in Microsoft Dynamics SL. At Training Material Completion On completing this course you will be well acquainted with:
  • Analyzer inquiry and drill-down tools
  • Analyzer reporting and export tools
  • Maintaining EAC and FAC
  • Reporting Options
Prerequisites Before reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • A basic understanding of modules covered in the core Project Series training courses (Project Controller, Allocator, Time & Expense and Flexible Billings)
